AUTH.SIGN_IN_SUB: Continue with the email address you used to sign up.
AUTH.SET_NEW_PASSWORD_SUB: Set your new password which you will be using for any future logins.
AUTH.NO_TENANT: You don't belong to any workspace.
AUTH.RESET_PASSWORD_SUB: Please enter the email address used to sign in to your account.

AUTH.CHOOSE_USER_SUB: Continue with the workspace for the organisation you want to log in to

NBLOCKS.INVITE_USERS_PLACEHOLDER: You can invite several users, just hit enter.

RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: Reset password
RESET_PASSWORD.BODY: Are you sure you want to reset the password? An email with instructions will be sent to the user.

DELETE_USER.TITLE: Delete user
DELETE_USER.BODY: Are you sure you want to delete the user? The user will be removed and will never be able to login again.
